name: predictorBot
overview: use spawnMemory to guess what cube is coming next

messages.success: Success. Select the function next(); to complete the tutorial.

end.code: for (x = 1; (x < rules.cubes.spawnMemory) && (x < rounds.length); x++) { colors.filter(function(y) { y !== rounds[ rounds.length - x ].cubes[0] }) } return colors
